name: Nine Realms
description:
DESTROY ALL THE GODS!

The body of the thunder god has been taken over by the most cunning god of the universe. Find the gods hidden in different realms and destroy them all until you are the only god left standing!

YOU'RE THE VERY RAGNAROK ITSELF

There's no hero's tale here. On the contrary, you will be the nightmare of heroes! Develop your strategy and unleash the cosmic calamity.



EVERY DEFEAT IS A NEW BEGINNING

Giving up is not in the nature of the thunder god. Each time you are defeated, warp time and start over with what you've gained. Embark on your next journey more experienced and powerful.



CUSTOMIZE YOUR CHARACTER TO FIT YOUR STRATEGY

Various weapons, armors, abilities, allies, and more have been specifically designed for you to develop your own strategy. Choose what suits you best and develop it permanently. You are free to choose whatever you want before you start fighting.



REALMS, CHARACTERS, AND CREATURES TO DISCOVER

With dynamic and voiced dialogues, realms offering different experiences and challenges, a vast bestiary, and dozens of characters you will get to know, Nine Realms presents a new universe and a deep story that tackles Norse Mythology in a different reality, waiting for you to discover.

FATE BOWS BEFORE THE INEVITABLE

Enjoy being the thunder god with detailed leveling and development systems, an immersive story, and realistic graphic quality! Remember, there are no rules here, you are here only to destroy.
